climbs.name: You Must Be This Tall to Ride the Monkey

content.description: you start with your left hand on an inwardly sloping disk hold with your left sloping on the large hueco. You move to the crimp above your left hand and then heel hand match on the right side as you reach for the crimp at the lip
content.protection: You could do this problem without a bouldering pad, but hey, 1 can't hurt ya
content.location: The left side of the road boulder in Triassic, left hand on the inward sloping disk, right on the 2nd sloper for "A Great Day For Freedom"

content.description: Sit start on the flake rail go up and left of the hole.
content.location: This is on the Road Boulder which is directly below the Rum boulder near the road. Locate the rail on the left side.

content.description: Sit down start on the low rail, fire your left hand up to a sloper and then work your way up staying to the left of the hole. Same top out as Pieta
content.location: This is on the Road Boulder which is directly below the Rum boulder near the road. Locate the rail on the left side.

content.description: Start on the same flaky rail as Pieta and climb to the right of the hole.
content.location: This is on the Road Boulder which is directly below the Rum boulder near the road. Locate the rail on the left side.
